segments.text: Yes , please . I'm picking out some presents for my children and wife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of presents do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I don't know exactly . Do you have anything recommended ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . How about some very cool sneakers for your children ? Anyway , it won't cost you much . It's only around $ 59.95 for each pair . It might be cheaper than that in America .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , How did you know I came from America ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's really cheap for shoes like those . OK , I'll take 5 pairs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because in this duty-free shop , your total expenditure cannot be over $ 300 and you also have one more present to buy for your wife .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my God . I've totally forgotten about that . Anyway , I think she would like a bottle of perfume .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good . And I can also recommend you a good one . It's the brand of DENY .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: DENY ? That's very expensive in America . It costs nearly $ 70 for only 50ml .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's very unbelievable . Is it fake ?
segments.speaker: S2
